Description:
Do you match this profile? Are you passionate about Luxury Retail and have previous experience in it?Are you organized and energetic?Do you have a strong spirit of initiative & commitment?Are you passionate about jewelry & timepieces?If so, apply for this job!What do we expect from you?As a Sales Associate, you will actively contribute to boutique turnover, participate in commercial & non-commercial events for the Maison, follow Brand visual identity guidelines (visual merchandising, day-to-day maintenance, etc.), perform customer service activities allowed in the boutique (shining, engraving, etc.), and foster business opportunities through cross-selling.You will transmit and share knowledge with peers and contribute to positive team spirit & actively participate in the day-to-day boutique life. You will be the ambassador of Maison at all levels!By joining the Maison, you are joining a team in which professional development is one of our main focuses.More than a job… it’s an experience!The recruitment process:Apply online:If your profile matches our search, you will be contacted by our Talent team for an interview. Otherwise, you will receive an email informing you that your application has not been successful.
You will meet with the HR, Boutique Manager, and Head of Retail.Job Details
